item.description:
I plan to stay on the Gravel / Dirt Roads.   The Bike I am using, is a Mountain / Hybrid, with wide tires.  It does NOT have any suspension.  If you ever wanted to try a little Off-Road Riding, this is the place for you.  So there is no confusion, I am a beginner, at Off-Road Riding.  If you are an Experienced  Rider & want to Explore the many Trails in Arcadia, you are more than welcome to step-up and take anyone who wants a more challenging Ride.

 

FYI: I have Hiked  these Trails & Roads Quite a  few times.  I want you to feel comfortable & not worry about getting Lost.

 

Hunting Season is here, but only Archery. Shotgun Season in December, is the most Dangerous.  You only need 200 sq. inches, of Orange.  I will bring a couple of Vests.  I will be wearing one of my Orange Riding Jerseys. You can get a Cheap Vest at Walmart for around $ 5.00.  I am not concerned, because we are on " Roads " & Archers usually do not shoot, unless they know what they are shooting at.  FYI: I Hike in the Woods with Archers & even Muzzleloaders, all the Time.  You will not find me in the Woods, where Hunting is allowed,  during Shotgun Season.

 

I would like to Ride, for a couple of Hours.

 

Directions: Route 95 exit 5A, get on Route 3 South and take Route 165 West, there is a Blinking Light, where you turn,  ( Ten Rod Road ) Take RI 165 west from RI 3 for 2+ miles. When you see the West Exeter Baptist Church on the right begin to slow as 0.2 miles past the church is the Arcadian Midway Parking area on the north side (Right  Side )  of the highway (right turn on Barber Road and lot is there on the right).
item.name: How About a Little Off Road Biking, in Arcadia ??
